creator: rich@steelezone.net
text: The existing <checksum> task allows two variables in the format attribute: {0} for the checksum and {1} for the file name.  I sometimes would like the path (maybe as {2}) because, for example, I'm not necessarily putting the checksum file alongside the checksummed file.

creator: bodewig@apache.org

{2} is the path relative to the checksum file, {3} the path relative to
the project's basedir and {4} the absolute path.
